Basic command line app
======================

Try type these commands in terminal

```sh
go build
./basic
./basic --required=1
./basic --required=1 -s=not-a-bool
./basic --required=2 --long-flag=4
./basic --required=2 --long-flag=-4
./basic --required=2 --long-flag -4
./basic --required=2 --long-flag=1001
...
```
